item.title: InspecTor
item.description:
InspecTor: Metadata Extraction from Websites

InspecTor is a command-line tool designed for extracting metadata from websites, including .onion domains, while maintaining anonymity through the Tor network. This tool provides a straightforward way to gather information such as emails, phone numbers, links, images, and more, making it useful for cybersecurity researchers, investigators, and analysts. Its ability to handle dynamic content with Selenium and process multiple URLs concurrently adds flexibility and efficiency to metadata collection.
